addressleaf.section:
To the right honorable S
r
Robert Cecill knight of her Ma
ties
privie Councel.

25 July 1595 M
r
Bodley to my M
r

page.lettertext:
fol.55r
May it please yo
r
H. I will not faile to
morowe in
e after noone, to give my attendance
at yo
r
chamber, beseeching yow
e while to consi-
der of those doubtes,
at I have moved in
e schedule
w
ch
I send yow heereinclosed, and to affourde me
at my c
o
ming suche particular direction, as yo
r
H.
thinkes expedient.
And so I take my humble leave.
L
o
July 25
Yo
r
H. most humble at commaundem
t
. Tho. Bodley
